summary: The document is an FBI identification form dated April 14, 1995, related to the JFK assassination investigation. It details Santo Trafficante, Jr.'s travels between Madrid, Spain, and Lisbon, Portugal, in November 1966, including his interactions with Cuban attorney Rafael Garcia Bango regarding a property purchase in Madrid and his activities in the city. The document also notes Trafficante's brief presence at Lisbon Airport without leaving the premises.
key_findings: Santo Trafficante, Jr. traveled from Madrid to Lisbon in November 1966.
He was in contact with Cuban attorney Rafael Garcia Bango for property purchase discussions in Madrid.
Trafficante's activities in Madrid included visiting restaurants, shows, and night clubs with Garcia Bango and his family.
He arrived and departed Lisbon Airport on the same day without leaving the airport.
keywords: Portuguese International and State Security Police
